Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.graphical

Class GraphicalBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.graphical.GraphicalBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
CharFigure
public class GraphicalBoard
extends java.lang.Object
implements CharFigure

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    GraphicalBoard​(CharStream stream)
    This constructor initializes the GraphicalBoard given the stream that will be used in order to print itself.

  • Method Summary

    void draw()
    This method is used to draw the GraphicalBoard on the stream.

    This method is used to draw the GraphicalBoard on the stream given the coordinates.
    GraphicalCell getCell​(java.awt.Point pos)
    This method returns a GraphicalCell instance given its position on the GraphicalBoard.

    This method returns the position on the GraphicalBoard of the given worker.

    This method resets the highlighted cells that corresponds to the possible actions.

  • Constructor Details

    • GraphicalBoard

      public GraphicalBoard​(CharStream stream)
      This constructor initializes the GraphicalBoard given the stream that will be used in order to print itself. The GraphicalBoard rep is a rows * columns matrix of GraphicalCells.
      Parameters:
      stream - is the given CHarStream.

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public void draw()
      This method is used to draw the GraphicalBoard on the stream. The absolute default coordinates are used.
      Specified by:
      draw in interface CharFigure

    • draw

      public void draw​(int relX, int relY)
      This method is used to draw the GraphicalBoard on the stream given the coordinates. Alongside the board coordinates are displayed and this method calls the worker and buildings' draw method to display themselves relatively to the GraphicalBoard position on th stream.
      Specified by:
      draw in interface CharFigure
      Parameters:
      relX - is the X coordinate.
      relY - is the Y coordinate.

    • resetPossibleActions

      public void resetPossibleActions()
      This method resets the highlighted cells that corresponds to the possible actions.

    • setPossibleActions

      public void setPossibleActions​(java.util.List<java.awt.Point> possiblePositions)
      This method sets the highlighted cells that corresponds to the possible actions given a list of positions.
      Parameters:
      possiblePositions - is the list of possible positions.

    • getCell

      public GraphicalCell getCell​(java.awt.Point pos)
      This method returns a GraphicalCell instance given its position on the GraphicalBoard.
      Parameters:
      pos - is the given position.
      Returns:
      and instance of GraphicalCell.

    • removeWorker

      public void removeWorker​(java.lang.String playerID, java.lang.Integer workerNumber)
      This method removes a worker from the GraphicalBoard given its playerID and its number.
      Parameters:
      playerID - is the String containing the playerID.
      workerNumber - is the number of the given worker.

    • getWorkerPosition

      public java.awt.Point getWorkerPosition​(java.lang.String playerID, java.lang.Integer workerNumber)
      This method returns the position on the GraphicalBoard of the given worker.
      Parameters:
      playerID - is the String containing the playerID.
      workerNumber - is the number of the given worker.
      Returns:
      a Point containing the worker's coordinates, null if it's not present.
